title: Shattered Relics League/Tasks/Fishing
content:
Name Task Requirements Comp%
Beginner
Catch a Shrimp Catch a Raw Shrimp whilst fishing. N/A 97%
Catch a Herring Catch a Raw Herring whilst fishing. 10 Fishing 88%
Easy
Catch an Anchovy Catch a Raw Anchovy whilst fishing. 15 Fishing 90%
Catch a Karambwanji Catch a Karambwanji on Karamja. 5 Fishing 70%
Complete a Fishing Trawler Game Complete a Fishing Trawler game at Port Khazard. N/A 37%
Medium
Catch 100 Lobsters Catch 100 Raw Lobsters whilst fishing. 40 Fishing 84%
Catch 50 Swordfish Catch 50 Raw Swordfish whilst fishing. 50 Fishing 79%
Catch 50 Salmon Catch 50 Raw Salmon whilst fishing. 30 Fishing 79%
Catch a Salmon on Karamja Catch a Salmon on Karamja. 30 Fishing
Completion of Shilo Village 		57%
Enter the Fishing Guild Enter the Fishing Guild. 68 Fishing 70%
1 Tempoross Kill Help the Spirit Anglers subdue the Tempoross. 35 Fishing 25%
25 Tempoross Kills Help the Spirit Anglers subdue the Tempoross 25 times. 35 Fishing 9.6%
50 Tempoross Kills Help the Spirit Anglers subdue the Tempoross 50 times. 35 Fishing 3.6%
75 Tempoross Kills Help the Spirit Anglers subdue the Tempoross 75 times. 35 Fishing 1.5%
Hard
Catch 100 Shark Catch 100 raw shark whilst fishing. 76 Fishing 62%
Catch 100 Karambwans Catch 100 Karambwans on Karamja. 65 Fishing
Completion of Tai Bwo Wannai Trio 		64%
Catch a Monkfish Catch a monkfish at the Piscatoris Fishing Colony. 62 Fishing
Completion of Swan Song 		37%
Equip a Full Angler's Outfit Equip a full set of angler gear. 34 Fishing 9.3%
Catch 100 Dark Crabs Catch 100 Dark Crabs in the Wilderness. 85 Fishing 32%
100 Tempoross Kills Help the Spirit Anglers subdue the Tempoross 100 times. 35 Fishing 1.0%
150 Tempoross Kills Help the Spirit Anglers subdue the Tempoross 150 times. 35 Fishing 0.4%
200 Tempoross Kills Help the Spirit Anglers subdue the Tempoross 200 times. 35 Fishing 0.2%
250 Tempoross Kills Help the Spirit Anglers subdue the Tempoross 250 times. 35 Fishing 0.1%
Elite
Reach Level 99 Fishing Reach level 99 in your Fishing skill. 99 Fishing 41%
Obtain 25 Million Fishing XP Obtain 25 million experience in your Fishing skill. 99 Fishing 9.2%
Dissect 50 Sacred Eels Dissect 50 Sacred eels. 87 Fishing, 72 Cooking
Partial completion of Regicide; must speak with Priestess Zul-Harcinqa first 		36%
275 Tempoross Kills Help the Spirit Anglers subdue the Tempoross 275 times. 35 Fishing 0.1%
300 Tempoross Kills Help the Spirit Anglers subdue the Tempoross 300 times. 35 Fishing 0.1%
350 Tempoross Kills Help the Spirit Anglers subdue the Tempoross 350 times. 35 Fishing <0.1%
